@EricksHinumaru I dont think that camtasia is better than FRAPS at recording games. I have tried and trust me, it lags like hell in camtasia. So its best to use FRAPS its better and faster as the vid is ready with a simple hotkey. for camtasia you will have to wait once you finish recording. Here is what i do when i make gameplay vids. I record with FRAPS, and then edit that video in camtasia. SO if you are recording games, best to go for FRAPS, if you are recording something else, Camtasia is better for the quality. (But it lags too much for making game vids)
